Class ViewMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.message.client.ClientMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.message.client.ViewMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Serializable
public class ViewMessage extends ClientMessage
Client message containing a client bound text message from the server.
